alert.note: Alert for Fergus; Judith Basin (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 2:27PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A cluster of showers with strong wind gusts will impact portions of southeastern Judith Basin and southern Fergus Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 224 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a large area of showers clustered near Moore, or 7 miles west of Lewistown, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and brief heavy rain. A few thunderstorms with isolated lightning strikes may also develop within these showers. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lewistown, Hobson, Moore, Grass Range, Roy, Fergus, Forestgrove, Moccasin, Ackley Lake State Park, Glengarry, Garneill, Danvers, Giltedge, Hilger, Heath, Buffalo and Benchland. This includes the following highways... Highway 200 between mile markers 50 and 123. Highway 191 between mile markers 1 and 77. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
